boards.name: Central Board of Secondary Education
boards.description: A national-level board for public and private schools.

boards.name: Council for the Indian School Certificate Examinations
boards.description: Conducts the ICSE and ISC exams.

boards.name: Board of Intermediate Education, Andhra Pradesh
boards.description: Conducts intermediate exams in Andhra Pradesh.

boards.name: Assam Higher Secondary Education Council
boards.description: Conducts higher secondary exams in Assam.

boards.name: Bihar School Examination Board
boards.description: Conducts secondary and intermediate exams in Bihar.

boards.name: Chhattisgarh Board of Secondary Education
boards.description: Conducts secondary and higher secondary exams in Chhattisgarh.

boards.name: Maharashtra State Board of Secondary and Higher Secondary Education
boards.description: Conducts secondary and higher secondary exams in Maharashtra.

boards.name: Madhya Pradesh Board of Secondary Education
boards.description: Conducts secondary and higher secondary exams in Madhya Pradesh.

boards.name: Uttar Pradesh Madhyamik Shiksha Parishad
boards.description: Conducts secondary and higher secondary exams in Uttar Pradesh.

boards.name: West Bengal Council of Higher Secondary Education
boards.description: Conducts higher secondary exams in West Bengal.
